settings.title: I’m not able to log in. What should I do?
settings.content:
• Have you created an account? If not, click on "Don't have an account? Create one"
  • Double-check your email address and password for any typos
  • Make sure Caps Lock is not turned off.
  • If you’re still unable to log in, click “Forgot Password?” to reset your password

settings.title: I forgot my password. How do I reset it?
settings.content:
• Click on “Forgot Password?” below the login form.
  • Enter your registered email address and follow the link sent to your inbox.
  • Create a new password and log in again.

settings.title: I didn’t receive the password reset email. Now what?
settings.content:
• Check your spam/junk folder — sometimes emails land there.
  • Make sure you entered the correct email address.
  • If you still don’t get it, contact our Customer Happiness Officers here.

settings.title: I created an account, but I still can’t log in. Now what?
settings.content: Your account may not be activated yet. You can raise a ticket over here and we will sent you an account activation.
